---
id: pix-collection-location
title: "Create an immediate collection without location informations"
description: "Use this endpoint to create a QRCode without sending location id (in this endpoint, it is not necessary to create a location before to create a collection)."
sidebar_label: "Create an immediate collection without location informations"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create an immediate collection without location informations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/merchant/collection/location/{txId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint to create a QRCode without sending location id (in this endpoint, it is not necessary to create a location before to create a collection).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"txId":{"value":"5a028e0a5fe1497c97b4c0743bcdd78f\t\r\n"}},"name":"txId","description":"The unique transaction identification given by the client side.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
